alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 3:33PM EDT until July 26 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR MONROE COUNTY... At 332 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Carleton to Monroe to near Luna Pier, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of Monroe County, including the following locations... Newport, Samaria, Estral Beach, Scofield, Erie, South Rockwood, Woodland Beach, Oakville, Stony Point and La Salle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
